entries.meaning: (hunting, animal husbandry) The hart in its second year; a young deer.
(UK, slang, derogatory) A knobhead; a stupid or obnoxious person.
examples: Harry chuckled. 'What is it, old son? Are you worried Natalie will go for a rummage in your undercarriage and come away empty-handed?'Ad spat Tango across the table, missing me by inches.'No, you knobber,' I said. “I'm meeting her parents for the first time tomorrow.'
